mapper.select: SELECT BBS_SEQ, USER_ID, BBS_GROUP, BBS_ORDER, BBS_INDENT, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, BBS_PARENT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, BBS_SEQ, USER_ID, BBS_GROUP, BBS_ORDER, BBS_INDENT, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, BBS_PARENT FROM ( SELECT BBS_SEQ, USER_ID, NVL(BBS_GROUP, 0) AS BBS_GROUP, NVL(BBS_ORDER, 0) AS BBS_ORDER, NVL(BBS_INDENT, 0) AS BBS_INDENT, NVL(BBS_TITLE, '') AS BBS_TITLE, NVL(BBS_CONTENT, '') AS BBS_CONTENT, NVL(BBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS BBS_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(BBS_PARENT, 0) AS BBS_PARENT FROM TBL_BOARD ) )
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD ( BBS_SEQ, USER_ID, BBS_GROUP, BBS_ORDER, BBS_INDENT, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, BBS_PARENT ) VALUES ( #{bbsSeq}, #{userId}, #{bbsGroup}, #{bbsOrder}, #{bbsIndent}, #{bbsTitle}, #{bbsContent}, #{bbsReadCnt}, SYSDATE, #{bbsParent} )

INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD_FILE ( BBS_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_NAME, FILE_EXT, FILE_SIZE, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{bbsSeq}, #{fileSeq}, #{fileOrgName}, #{fileName}, #{fileExt}, #{fileSize}, SYSDATE )
